meanings.sent1: The nonagonal shape of the playground was unique among all the other shapes.
meanings.sent2: The nonagonal table fit perfectly in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent3: The nonagonal pizza slices made for an interesting party snack.
meanings.sent4: Her nonagonal personality shone through in her love for organizing everything in groups of nine.
meanings.sent5: The nonagonal pattern on the rug was mesmerizing to look at.

meanings.definition: A polygon with nine sides and nine angles.
meanings.sent1: The children learned about the nonagonal in their geometry class.
meanings.sent2: The garden had a beautiful fountain in the shape of a nonagonal.
meanings.sent3: The nonagonal on the flag represented unity among the nine regions.
meanings.sent4: The nonagonal of the gem reflected the light in nine different directions.
meanings.sent5: The building's architecture featured a stunning nonagonal window at the top.
